survey_name: Health and Wellness App User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on health and wellness mobile applications to understand satisfaction levels, feature preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use a health and wellness app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of selection. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use a health and wellness app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your health and wellness app? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse usage patterns. Include an 'Other' option for additional features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes). Include an open-text field if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which features do you use most frequently in your health and wellness app? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).

questions.question_text: What do you like most about your current health and wellness app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What do you like most about your current health and wellness app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the data provided by your health and wellness app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the data provided by your health and wellness app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your health and wellness app?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to collect suggestions for improvement. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your health and wellness app?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents who use the app at least 'Once a week' (Q1).
